summary: A caller discusses a complaint he made to ITC regarding a mattress he ordered through Amazon. The caller was charged Rs. 155 for a Rs. 20 item and wants to know the status of his complaint and if he will receive a refund. The customer service representative checks the complaint and informs the caller that they will forward the complaint to their team. The caller becomes agitated and tells the representative that if they do not take action, he will file a complaint against ITC and close the company. The representative apologizes and promises to forward the complaint to the relevant team. The caller then provides screenshots of the order and payment to the representative. The caller is then put on hold and the recording of the call ends.
cohere_points:
- A customer calls an ITC employee to know about the status of his complaint and discusses an issue with an Amazon seller. 
- The customer bought a mattress on Amazon
- He was charged Rs. 155 for a Rs. 20 worth item which he prepaid through his debit card
- The employee asks the customer to send a screenshot of the payment mode
- The employee will inform the team and resolve the issue.
Topic:
1. Customer Complaint
2. Delayed Delivery
3. High Charges
4. Incorrect MRP
5. Amazon Order
6. Refund Request
7. Screen Shot Evidence
8. Prepaid Payment
9. Payment Mode Details
10. Debit Card Information
11. Personal Details
12. Receipt Confirmation
13. Issuing Refund
14. Customer Service Interaction
15. Escalating Complaint
Resolution: The customer's issue has not been resolved yet as additional information requested to verify the payment made.
Did the caller Displayed Empathy: Yes, the call displayed empathy. The caller displayed empathy by listening attentively to the caller's concerns and offering to help resolve the issue promptly.
